articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy 
   Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Chea Sim, chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia, and Keo Puth Rasmey, chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in that country on Feb. 16, the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
